item.title: Setting Up Icarus Verilog on Google Colab
item.description: Google Colab is a cloud-based platform that allows you to run code in a Jupyter Notebook environment. While it’s primarily designed for Python, it can also be adapted to run Verilog simulations using Icarus Verilog. This guide walks you through setting up Icarus Verilog on Colab, writing and compiling Verilog code, running simulations, and generating waveform files for debuggingâ€”all in the cloud.
